Threat Intel - RansomHub Ransomware
Date Added - 8/9/24

SUMMARY: RansomHub has asserted responsibility for encrypting data on over 40,000 computers within JG Summitâ€™s network. A countdown timer prominently displayed on the ransom note indicates that the conglomerate has slightly more than seven days to comply with the attackers' demands before additional actions are taken. As of 7:09 PM on August 7, 2024, the timer reads "7 days, 16 hours, 22 minutes, and 24 seconds."

SOURCE:
1. https://1275.ru/ioc/3469/ransomhub-ransomware-iocs/
2. https://www.watchguard.com/wgrd-security-hub/ransomware-tracker/ransomhub
3. https://symantec-enterprise-blogs.security.com/threat-intelligence/ransomhub-knight-ransomware
